anya-e1001n4:8_0: Atipiyo na kātabbo, khalo kotuhalaṁ karo;
anya-e1001n4:11_0: Sappo duṭṭho khalo duṭṭho, sappā duṭṭhataro khalo;
anya-e1001n4:14_0: Yo bālo maññati bālyaṁ, paṇḍito vāpi tenaso;
anya-e1001n4:15_0: Bālo ca paṇḍitamānī, sa ve bāloti vuccati.
anya-e1001n4:17_0: Madhūva maññati bālo, yāva pāpaṁ na paccati;
anya-e1001n4:18_0: Yadā ca paccati pāpaṁ, atha dukkhaṁ nigacchati.
anya-e1001n4:20_0: Na sādhu balavā bālo, sāhasā vindate dhanaṁ;
anya-e1001n4:23_0: Ghare duṭṭho mūsiko ca, vane duṭṭho ca vānaro;
anya-e1001n4:24_0: Sakuṇe ca duṭṭho kāko, nareduṭṭho ca brāhmaṇo.
anya-e1001n4:26_0: Dīghā jāgarato ratti, dīghaṁ santassa yojanaṁ;
anya-e1001n4:32_0: Nattadosaṁ pare jaññā, jaññā dosaṁ parassatu;
anya-e1001n4:38_0: Yathā udumbarapakkā, bahi rattakā eva ca;
anya-e1001n4:42_0: Na so dhammaṁ vijānāti, dabbī sūparasaṁ yathā.
anya-e1001n4:45_0: Ekacariyaṁ daḷhaṁ kayirā, natthi bāle sahāyatā.
anya-e1001n4:50_0: Dujjanena samaṁ veraṁ, sakhyañcāpi na kāraye;
anya-e1001n4:51_0: Uṇho dahati caṅgāro, sīto kaṇhāyate karaṁ.
anya-e1001n4:54_0: Madhu tiṭṭhati jivhagge, hadaye halāhalaṁ visaṁ.
anya-e1001n4:57_0: Maṇinā bhūsito sappo, kimeso na bhayaṅkaro.
anya-e1001n4:62_0: Yathāpi pana sapakkā, bahi kaṇṭakameva ca;
anya-e1001n4:71_0: Upadeso hi mūḷhānaṁ, pakopāya na santiyā.
anya-e1001n4:73_0: Na ṭhātabbaṁ na gantabbaṁ, dujjanena samaṁ kvaci;
anya-e1001n4:74_0: Dujjano hi dukkhaṁ deti, na so sukhaṁ kadācipi.
anya-e1001n4:76_0: Abaddhā tattha bajjhanti, yattha bālā pabhāsare;
anya-e1001n4:77_0: Baddhāpi tattha muccanti, yattha dhīrā pabhāsare.
anya-e1001n4:89_0: Hitakkaro paro bandhu, bandhupi ahito paro;
anya-e1001n4:102_0: Rājadvāre susāne ca, yo tiṭṭhati so bandhavā.
anya-e1001n4:104_0: Na 2 vissase amittassa, mittañcāpi na vissase;
anya-e1001n4:107_0: Mātā mittaṁ pitā ceti, sabhāvā taṁ tayaṁ hitaṁ;
anya-e1001n4:110_0: Āpadāsu mittaṁ jaññā, yuddhe sūraṁ iṇe suciṁ;
anya-e1001n4:111_0: Bhariyaṁ khīṇesu vittesu, byasanesu ca bandhavaṁ.
anya-e1001n4:113_0: Sakiṁ duṭṭhañca yo mittaṁ, puna sandhātumicchati;
anya-e1001n4:117_0: Punappunaṁ vivaḍḍhanti, tasmā sesaṁ na kāraye.
anya-e1001n4:120_0: Tādisaṁ no paseveyya, hadaye tu halāhalaṁ.
anya-e1001n4:122_0: Na seve pharusaṁ sāmiṁ, na ca seveyya macchariṁ;
anya-e1001n4:123_0: Tato apaggaṇha sāmiṁ, neva niggahitaṁ tato.
anya-e1001n4:131_0: Ahitā paṭisedho ca, hitesu ca payojanaṁ;
anya-e1001n4:134_0: Piyo garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e1001n4:135_0: Gambhīrañca kathaṁ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako;
anya-e1001n4:137_0: Piyo garu bhāva nīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e1001n4:138_0: Gambhirañca kathaṁ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako.
anya-e1001n4:146_0: Piyo garu bhāvaniyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e1001n4:147_0: Gambhirañca kathaṁ kattā, na caṭṭhāne niyojako;
anya-e1001n4:149_0: Piyo garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e1001n4:150_0: Gambhirañca kathaṁ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako;
